titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain manufacturing equipment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/5/2003--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on certain extruders to be used in the production of radial tires for the off-the-highway use.
